snippet: Iran’s threat to blockade the Strait of Hormuz would have an immediate impact, energy analysts say, with the price of oil potentially rising 50 percent within days.
abstract: Energy analysts say Iran’s threat to blockade the Strait of Hormuz would have an immediate impact, with the price of oil potentially rising 50 percent within days; most Middle East experts contend that despite rising tensions with the West, Iran is unlikely to take such hostile action.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s threat to blockade the Strait of Hormuz would have an immediate impact, energy analysts say, with the price of oil potentially rising 50 percent within days.

headline.main: Oil Price Would Skyrocket if Iran Closed the Strait of Hormuz
headline.print_headline: Oil Price Would Skyrocket If Iran Closed the Strait

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
